what: Functions to Set Up the Directory Structure of the PFU Database
title: Functions to Set Up the Directory Structure of the PFU Database
text: PFUSetup automates setup process PFU database project. Well, least figures locations several directories common installations PFU database platform- machine-independent manner.

title: Functions to Set Up the Directory Structure of the PFU Database
text: can install latest version PFUSetup GitHub :

what: Get absolute paths to important files and folders appropriate for this computer — get_abs_paths
title: Get absolute paths to important files and folders appropriate for this computer — get_abs_paths
text: Default argument values assume directory structure includes Dropbox appropriate Fellowship project Dr. Paul Brockway.

title: Get absolute paths to important files and folders appropriate for this computer — get_abs_paths
code: get_abs_paths(   home_path = fs::path_home() %>% as.character(),   dropbox_path = "Dropbox",   project_path = file.path(dropbox_path, "Fellowship 1960-2015 PFU database"),   iea_folder_path = file.path(project_path, "IEA extended energy balance data",     "IEA 2021 energy balance data"),   iea_data_path = file.path(iea_folder_path,     "IEA Extended Energy Balances 2021 (ktoe).csv"),   country_concordance_path = file.path(project_path, "Mapping",     "Country_Concordance_Full.xlsx"),   aggregation_mapping_path = file.path(project_path, "Mapping",     "aggregation_mapping.xlsx"),   phi_constants_path = file.path(project_path, "Data", "Phi - Data",     "phi_constants.xlsx"),   exemplar_table_path = file.path(project_path, "Mapping", "Exemplar_Table.xlsx"),   fu_analysis_folder = file.path(project_path, "FU analysis data"),   ceda_data_folder = file.path(project_path, "Data", "CEDA Data"),   machine_data_folder = file.path(project_path, "Data", "Machines - Data"),   reports_source_folders = "reports",   reports_dest_folder = file.path(project_path, "Reports"),   workflow_output_folder = file.path(project_path, "PFUWorkflowOutput"),   workflow_releases_folder = file.path(project_path, "PFUWorkflowReleases"),   drake_cache_folder = file.path(getwd(), "..", "PFU-Database", ".drake") )

title: Get absolute paths to important files and folders appropriate for this computer — get_abs_paths
text: home_path absolute path user's home directory. dropbox_path path user's Dropbox directory, relative home_path. project_path path project directory, relative home_path. iea_folder_path path IEA data directory, relative home_path. iea_data_path path IEA data file, relative home_path. country_concordance_path path country concordance file, relative home_path. aggregation_mapping_path path aggregation mapping file, relative home_path. phi_constants_path path exergy--energy ratio file containing constant values, relative home_path. exemplar_table_path path exemplar table, relative home_path. fu_analysis_folder path folder containing final--useful exergy information, relative home_path. ceda_data_folder path folder containing CEDA (Centre Environmental Data Analysis) data, relative home_path. machine_data_folder path folder containing machine-specific efficiencies, relative home_path. reports_source_folders string vector paths folders containing report sources. reports_dest_folder path folder reports written, relative home_path. workflow_output_folder path folder containing zipped versions drake cache. Data stored using pins package. Default "PFUWorkflowOutput" relative project_path. workflow_releases_folder path folder containing released versions PSUT target data frame. Data stored using pins package. Default "PFUWorkflowReleases" relative project_path. drake_cache_folder path drake cache. Default ../PFU-Database/.drake, relative getwd(). See Details information.

title: Get absolute paths to important files and folders appropriate for this computer — get_abs_paths
text: named list containing paths important directories files, including: home_pathThe absolute path user's home. dropbox_pathThe absolute path user's Dropbox folder. project_pathThe absolute path project folder. iea_folder_pathThe absolute path folder containing IEA data. iea_data_pathThe absolute path IEA data file OECD countries. country_concordance_pathThe absolute path country concordance file. aggregation_mapping_pathThe absolute path aggregation mapping file. phi_constants_pathThe absolute path exergy--energy ratio file containing constant values. exemplar_table_pathThe path exemplar table. fu_analysis_folderThe absolute path folder containing final--useful exergy information. machine_data_folderThe absolute path folder containing machine-specific efficiency information. ceda_data_folderThe absolute path folder containing CEDA environment information. reports_source_foldersA vector absolute paths folders containing source reports. reports_dest_folderA directory completed reports written. workflow_output_folderThe path folder stores zipped versions drake cache. workflow_releases_folderThe path folder stores releases PSUT target. drake_cache_folderThe path drake cache.

title: Get absolute paths to important files and folders appropriate for this computer — get_abs_paths
text: default argument home_path gets value fs::path_home(). default value drake_cache_folder assumes PFUSetup folder (project's folder) sibling working directory drake workflow run. assumption true, users free pass non-default value function.

title: Get absolute paths to important files and folders appropriate for this computer — get_abs_paths
code: get_abs_paths() #> $home_path #> [1] "/Users/mkh2" #>  #> $dropbox_path #> [1] "/Users/mkh2/Dropbox" #>  #> $project_path #> [1] "/Users/mkh2/Dropbox/Fellowship 1960-2015 PFU database" #>  #> $iea_folder_path #> [1] "/Users/mkh2/Dropbox/Fellowship 1960-2015 PFU database/IEA extended energy balance data/IEA 2021 energy balance data" #>  #> $iea_data_path #> [1] "/Users/mkh2/Dropbox/Fellowship 1960-2015 PFU database/IEA extended energy balance data/IEA 2021 energy balance data/IEA Extended Energy Balances 2021 (ktoe).csv" #>  #> $country_concordance_path #> [1] "/Users/mkh2/Dropbox/Fellowship 1960-2015 PFU database/Mapping/Country_Concordance_Full.xlsx" #>  #> $aggregation_mapping_path #> [1] "/Users/mkh2/Dropbox/Fellowship 1960-2015 PFU database/Mapping/aggregation_mapping.xlsx" #>  #> $exemplar_table_path #> [1] "/Users/mkh2/Dropbox/Fellowship 1960-2015 PFU database/Mapping/Exemplar_Table.xlsx" #>  #> $phi_constants_path #> [1] "/Users/mkh2/Dropbox/Fellowship 1960-2015 PFU database/Data/Phi - Data/phi_constants.xlsx" #>  #> $fu_analysis_folder #> [1] "/Users/mkh2/Dropbox/Fellowship 1960-2015 PFU database/FU analysis data" #>  #> $machine_data_folder #> [1] "/Users/mkh2/Dropbox/Fellowship 1960-2015 PFU database/Data/Machines - Data" #>  #> $ceda_data_folder #> [1] "/Users/mkh2/Dropbox/Fellowship 1960-2015 PFU database/Data/CEDA Data" #>  #> $reports_source_folders #> [1] "reports" #>  #> $reports_dest_folder #> [1] "/Users/mkh2/Dropbox/Fellowship 1960-2015 PFU database/Reports" #>  #> $workflow_output_folder #> [1] "/Users/mkh2/Dropbox/Fellowship 1960-2015 PFU database/PFUWorkflowOutput" #>  #> $workflow_releases_folder #> [1] "/Users/mkh2/Dropbox/Fellowship 1960-2015 PFU database/PFUWorkflowReleases" #>  #> $drake_cache_folder #> [1] "/Users/mkh2/github/PFUSetup/docs/reference/../PFU-Database/.drake" #>

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: See magrittr::%>% details.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.9 (2022-03-23)
text: Now includes path aggregation mapping file. Now includes folders drake cache PSUT target outputs.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.8 (2021-10-15)
text: Update documentation paths. Added phi_constants table output get_abs_paths(). Exemplar table now sits Mapping folder. Changed get_abs_paths() tests reflect change.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.7 (2021-09-06)
text: Now using IEA’s 2021 release, data 2019.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.6 (2021-08-20)
text: Added country_concordance_path argument. Now 23 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100 %.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.5 (2021-05-07)
text: Now making character vector home path. fs::path_home() %>% .character() Now 22 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100 %.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.4 (2021-04-27)
text: Added drake_cache_path list strings returned get_abs_paths(). Now 22 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100 %.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.3 (2021-04-17)
text: Fixed warnings notes R CMD Check Now skips file existence tests running continuous integration systems. Added continuous integration testing. Still 20 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100 %.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.2 (2020-08-26)
text: Added reports_source_folder reports_dest_folder items output get_abs_paths().

title: PFUSetup 0.1.1 (2020-08-24)
text: NEWS.md file GitHub Pages Website Initial version
